messages.content: What is the purpose of the Image Randomizer node in ComfyUI_Fill-Nodes?
The Image Randomizer node allows you to pull images either in sequence or at random from a directory.
How does the Image Randomizer node ensure that it continues to pull new images even if the seed is fixed?
It uses a dummy int value and requires you to attach a seed generator of your choice set to random.
What is the function of the Image Captioning Saver node?
The Image Captioning Saver node saves a matching .txt file with the input image(s) using the desired captioning.
What happens to the saved files during continuous experimentation?
Both the image and text files will be overwritten on each run.
Provide some interesting uses of the Image Randomizer node.
Examples of interesting uses include cycling through images in a directory, generating random styles, and batch processing images.
